event.title: was created by an act of the Legislature of Georgia on December 10, 1790

data.event: Columbia County, the 12th county formed in Georgia, was created by an act of the Legislature of Georgia on December 10, 1790 from Richmond County.

event.title: had been inhabited for thousands of years

data.event: This area along the Savannah River had been inhabited for thousands of years by various cultures of indigenous peoples.
